verbs.description: [V: released] [ARG1: school bus video proves turn around do n't drown] is n't just a catchy phrase floodwater in leander texas swept away a school bus with a child and driver aboard on october 16 the local police just released the dash cam video leander tx school bus fox facebook turnarounddontdrown leander police department texas
